fhost¶

fhost is a Python module that helps you to manage your /etc/hostnames easily.

Provides you a API interface to add, remove and list maped local hostnames with IP’s that follows the standards of Hosts file.

It is licensed with the BSD three-clause license.

  • Install
  • Tutorial
  • Development
  • API Documentation

More information¶

fhost is written by Raül Pérez. For questions and suggestions concerning this project please go to its Github repository site and file a bug or write him a message.
